snippet.title: Zombies Ruined My Day - PlayStation 4 Gameplay
snippet.description:
This is the story of how the best day of your life can become a nightmare full of zombies. Survive in a hostile environment using all sorts of weapons. Defend your position with barricades, blow up groups of zombies with grenades, sweep the area away with a Gatling and more! All in a fully action packed game with colorful backgrounds and fearsome monsters. Show us that you're more than a snack for zombies!

Developed by mancebo
Published by Rendercode Games
Also released on Xbox 360 (Xbox Live Indie Games), PC, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch

#ps4 #playstation4 #theforeseenarcade #zombiesruinedmyday #zombiegames #zombie #zombiegame #mancebo
